mapper.select: select * from t_data_tables t1 ,t_dbus_datasource t2 where t1.ds_id = t2.id and t1.ver_id is null and t1.schema_id = #{schemaId}
select * from t_data_tables t1, t_dbus_datasource t2 where t1.ds_id = t2.id and t1.id = #{id}
select * from t_data_tables t1, t_dbus_datasource t2 where t1.ds_id = t2.id and t1.status = #{status}
select * from t_data_tables t1, t_dbus_datasource t2 where t1.ds_id = t2.id and t2.id = #{dsID}
select * from t_data_tables t1, t_dbus_datasource t2 where t1.ds_id = t2.id and t1.schema_id = #{schemaID}
select * from t_data_tables t1 where t1.ds_id = #{dsID} and t1.schema_name = #{schemaName}
select * from t_data_tables t1, t_dbus_datasource t2 where t1.ds_id = t2.id and t1.table_name LIKE "%"#{tableName}"%"

select t1.*, t2.ds_name,t2.ds_type, t3.version, t3.inner_version from t_data_tables t1 left join t_dbus_datasource t2 on t1.ds_id = t2.id left join t_meta_version t3 on t1.ver_id = t3.id where 1=1 and t1.ds_id = #{dsID} and t1.schema_name like "%"#{schemaName}"%" and t1.table_name like "%"#{tableName}"%" order by t1.create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into t_data_tables (ds_id, schema_id, schema_name, table_name, physical_table_regex, output_topic, ver_id, status, create_time) values (#{dsID}, #{schemaID}, #{schemaName}, #{tableName}, #{physicalTableRegex}, #{outputTopic}, #{verID}, #{status}, current_timestamp())
mapper.update: update t_data_tables set ds_id = #{dsID}, schema_id = #{schemaID}, schema_name = #{schemaName}, table_name = #{tableName}, physical_table_regex = #{physicalTableRegex}, output_before_update_flg = #{outputBeforeUpdateFlg}, ver_id = #{verID}, status = #{status}, create_time = current_timestamp() where id = #{id}
